elements.text: At a neighborhood meeting, you forget the answer to an important question. Your neighbors exchange glances that leave you unsure about how they perceive your capabilities and PD symptoms. However, one neighbor offers to fill you in, and you think that your neighbors are...

elements.name: Question at Meeting_Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
